amendment.description: Amendment adjusts the emerging growth company definition for inflation in order to provide more flexibility for businesses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-409 to adjust the Emerging Growth Company definition for inflation, resulting in providing more flexibility for businesses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McIntyre amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. McIntyre.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McIntyre amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
